title.value: О необходимости разработки передвижной тормозной диагностической установки
Necessity of the development of portable diagnostic brake installation
Necessity of the development of portable diagnostic brake installation

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Kravchuk, I.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Productivity of machine-and-tractor aggregate and fuel consumption per one hectare directly depends on technical condition of engine, or its effective power. Increase of fuel consumption may be caused by several reasons (disrepair of gas-distributive mechanism, defects of sleeve assembly, breakdown of cooling system). Therefore, to avoid unjustified over-expenditure of fuel, it is necessary to bear-out working conditions of engine. The questions of necessity of working out for the control of technical condition of the engine of a tractor and avoidance of the unjustified over-expenditure of fuel are considered in the article. The scheme of the developed mobile brake diagnostic installation for the control of technical condition of the engine is displayed in different views. The main advantages of the use of mobile brake diagnostic installation are enumerated.
